TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Reflection.Assembly ResolveEventHandler(object sender, ResolveEventArgs args);
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed ResolveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ResolveEventHandler(sender As Object, args As ResolveEventArgs) As Assembly
public delegate System::Reflection::Assembly ^ ResolveEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ResolveEventArgs ^ args);
type ResolveEventHandler = delegate of obj * ResolveEventArgs -> Assembly

summary.span: Representa un método que controla el evento , o de un .

span.span: Represents a method that handles the , , or event of an .

returns.span: Ensamblado que resuelve el tipo, ensamblado o recurso; o si no puede resolverse el ensamblado.

span.span: The assembly that resolves the type, assembly, or resource; or if the assembly cannot be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si el cargador de clases en tiempo de ejecución no puede resolver una referencia a un ensamblado, tipo o recurso, se generan los eventos correspondientes para dar una oportunidad para indicar al runtime ensamblado donde se encuentra el ensamblado que se hace referencia, tipo o recurso de la devolución de llamada.If the runtime class loader cannot resolve a reference to an assembly, type, or resource, the corresponding events are raised to give the callback a chance to tell the runtime which assembly the referenced assembly, type, or resource is in. Es responsabilidad de la para devolver el ensamblado que se resuelve el tipo, ensamblado o recurso, o para devolver null si no se reconoce el ensamblado.It is the responsibility of the to return the assembly that resolves the type, assembly, or resource, or to return null if the assembly is not recognized. Para obtener más información, consulte [resolver cargas de ensamblado](~/docs/framework/app-domains/resolve-assembly-loads.md) y , , y eventos.For more information, see [Resolving Assembly Loads](~/docs/framework/app-domains/resolve-assembly-loads.md) and the , , and events. > [!IMPORTANT] > A partir del [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], el evento se desencadena para todos los ensamblados, incluidos los ensamblados de recursos.Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the event is raised for all assemblies, including resource assemblies. En versiones anteriores, no se generó el evento para los ensamblados de recursos.In earlier versions, the event was not raised for resource assemblies. Si se localiza el sistema operativo, el controlador puede llamarse varias veces: una vez para cada referencia cultural de la cadena de reserva.If the operating system is localized, the handler might be called multiple times: once for each culture in the fallback chain. Cada clase derivada de y tiene un constructor y un `Invoke` método.Every derived class of and has a constructor and an `Invoke` method. Vea el ejemplo de código de C++ en la descripción de la clase.See the C++ code example in the description for the class.
